channel.dc:creator: Viktor Škorjanc

item.title: Breezeblocks
item.description: [Verse 1] F Am She may contain the urge to run away Dm But hold her down with soggy clothes and breezeblocks F Am Citrezene your fever’s gripped me again Dm Never kisses all you ever send are fullstops - la la la la F Am Do you know where the wilds things go Dm They go along to take your honey - la la la la F Am Break down now weep build up breakfast now Dm Let’s eat my love my love love love - la la la la [Chorus] F A Muscle to muscle and toe to toe Dm F The fear has gripped me but here I go F A My heart sinks as I jump up Dm F Your hand grips hand as my eyes shut F A Dm F F A Dm F Ahhh ahhh ahhh ah ah – ahhh ahhh ahhh ah ah [Verse 2] F Am Do you know where the wild things go Dm They go along to take your honey - la la la la F Am Break down let’s sleep build up breakfast now Dm Let’s eat my love my love love love - la la la la F Am She bruises coughs she splutters pistol shots Dm But hold her down with soggy clothes and breezeblocks F Am Dm She’s morphine queen of my vaccine my love my love love love - la la la la [Chorus] F A Muscle to muscle and toe to toe Dm F The fear has gripped me but here I go F A My heart sinks as I jump up Dm F Your hand grips hand as my eyes shut F A Dm F F A Dm F Ahhh ahhh ahhh ah ah – ahhh ahhh ahhh ah ah F A Dm F F A Dm F Ahhh ahhh ahhh ah ah – ahhh ahhh ahhh ah ah [Verse 3] F Am She may contain the urge to runaway Dm But hold her down with soggy clothes and breezeblocks F Am Dm Germaline disinfect the scene my love my love love love [Bridge] Dm7 Am But please don’t go I love you so.. Dm F F A# - A my lovely Dm F A# - A Please don’t go, please don’t go, I love you so, I love you so Dm F F Please don’t go, please don’t go, I love you so, I love you so A# A Please break my heart – hey Dm F A# - A Please don’t go, please don’t go, I love you so, I love you so Dm F F Please don’t go, please don’t go, I love you so, I love you so A# A Please break my heart – hey [Outro] F A Please don’t go, I’ll eat you whole Dm F I love you so, I love you, so I love you so F A Please don’t go I'll eat you whole Dm F I love you so, I love you so, I love you so, I love you so.. Copy
item.dc:creator: Viktor Škorjanc

item.title: Cheap Thrills
item.description: [Intro] F#m D A E F#m D A E [Verse 1] F#m D Come on, come on, turn the radio on A E It’s Friday night and I won’t be long F#m D Gotta do my hair, I put my make up on A E It’s Friday night and I won’t be long [Pre-Chorus] F#m Til I hit the dance floor D Hit the dance floor A E I got all I need F#m No I ain’t got cash D I ain’t got cash A E But I got you baby [Chorus] F#m D A E Baby I don’t need dollar bills to have fun tonight F#m D A E Baby I don’t need dollar bills to have fun tonight F#m D A E But I don’t need no money F#m D A E As long as I can feel the beat F#m D A E I don’t need no money F#m D A E As long as I keep dancing [Verse 2] F#m D Come on, come on, turn the radio on A E It’s Saturday and I won’t be long F#m D Gotta paint my nails, put my high heels on A E It’s Saturday and I won’t be long [Pre-Chorus] F#m Til I hit the dance floor D Hit the dance floor A E I got all I need F#m No I ain’t got cash D I ain’t got cash A E But I got you baby [Chorus] F#m D A E Baby I don’t need dollar bills to have fun tonight F#m D A E Baby I don’t need dollar bills to have fun tonight F#m D A E But I don’t need no money F#m D A E As long as I can feel the beat F#m D A E I don’t need no money F#m D A E As long as I keep dancing [Interlude] F#m D A E F#m D A E [Bridge] F#m D A E But I don’t need no money F#m D A E As long as I can feel the beat F#m D A E I don’t need no money F#m D A E As long as I keep dancing Oh, oh [Chorus] F#m D A E Baby I don’t need dollar bills to have fun tonight F#m D A E Baby I don’t need dollar bills to have fun tonight F#m D A E But I don’t need no money F#m D A E As long as I can feel the beat F#m D A E I don’t need no money F#m D A E As long as I keep dancing [Outro] F#m D A E Na, na, na, na, na, na, na F#m D A E Na, na, na, na, na, na, na F#m D A E Na, na, na, na, na, na, na F#m D A E Na, na, na, na, na, na, na Copy
item.dc:creator: Viktor Škorjanc

item.title: Do You Really Want to Hurt Me
item.description: [Verse 1] G D/F# Em Give me time, to realise my crime; G D/F# Em Let me love, and steal. G D/F# Em I have danced inside your eyes; G D/F# Em How can I be real? [Chorus 1] G D/F# Em Do you really want to hurt me? G D/F# Em Do you really want to make me cry? C G Am Precious kisses, words that burn me; Bm Bm [ Bm/E ] Lovers never ask you why. G D/F# Em In my heart, the fire is burning, G D/F# Em Choose my colour, find a star. C G Am Precious people always tell me; Bm/D Bm That's a step, a step too far. [Chorus 2] G D/F# Em Do you really want to hurt me? G D/F# Em Do you really want to make me cry? C G Am Do you really want to hurt me? Bm G G Am | Bb | % | Ab | Gm | % | Do you really want to make me cry-y? [Verse 2] G D/F# Em Words are few, I have spoken, G D/F# Em I could waste a thousand years. C G Am Wrapped in sorrow, words are token, Bm Bm [ Bm/E ] Come inside and catch my tears. G D/F# Em You've been talking, but be-lieve me, G D/F# Em If it's true, you don't know. C G Am This boy loves without a reason, Bm Bm [ Bm/E ] I'm prepared to let you go. [Bridge 1] C D C D If it's love you want from me, then take it a-way. C D C D Everything's not what you see; it's over a-gain. [Chorus 3] G D/F# Em Do you really want to hurt me? G D/F# Em Do you really want to make me cry? C G Am Do you really want to hurt me? Bm G G Am | Bb | % | Ab | Gm | % | Do you really want to make me cry-y? [Break] | Gm | % | % | % | | Gm | % | % | [Chorus 4] G D/F# Em Do you really want to hurt me? G D/F# Em Do you really want to make me cry? C G Am Do you really want to hurt me? Bm G Bb Do you really want to make me cry? G D/F# Em Do you really want to hurt me? G D/F# G Bb Do you really want to make me cry? Copy
item.dc:creator: Viktor Škorjanc

item.title: Karma Chameleon
item.description: [Verse] Bb F Bb Desert love in your eyes all the way Bb F Bb if I listen to your lies would you say Eb F I'm a man without conviction Eb F I'm a man who doesn't know Eb F How to sell a contracdiction Cm You come and go Gm F You come and go [Chorus] Bb F Gm Karma Karma Karma Karma Karma Chameleon Cm You come and go Bb F You come and go Bb F Gm Loving would be easy if your colours were like my dream Cm Red, gold and green Bb F Red, gold and green [Verse] Bb F Bb Didn't hear your wicked words every day Bb F Bb And you used to be so sweet I heard you say Eb F That my love was an addiction Eb F When we cling our love is strong Eb F When you go you're gone forever Cm You string along Gm F You string along [Chorus] Bb F Gm Karma Karma Karma Karma Karma Chameleon Cm You come and go Bb F You come and go Bb F Gm Loving would be easy if your colours were like my dream Cm Red, gold and green Bb F Red, gold and green [Bridge] Eb Dm Every day is like a survival Cm Gm You're my lover, not my rival Eb Dm Every day is like a survival Cm Gm F You're my lover, not my rival [Harmonica solo] Bb F Eb F I'm a man without conviction Eb F I'm a man who doesn't know Eb F How to sell a contracdiction Cm You come and go Gm F You come and go [Chorus] Bb F Gm Karma Karma Karma Karma Karma Chameleon Cm You come and go Bb F You come and go Bb F Gm Loving would be easy if your colours were like my dream Cm Red, gold and green Bb F Red, gold and green Copy
item.dc:creator: Viktor Škorjanc

item.title: Let Her Go
item.description: [Chorus] F C Well, you only need the light when it's burning low G Am Only miss the sun when it starts to snow F C G Only know you love her when you let her go F C Only know you've been high when you're feeling low G Am Only hate the road when you're missin' home F C Only know you love her when you let her go G And you let her go [Instrumental] Am F G Em Am F G [Verse 1] Am F Staring at the bottom of your glass G Em Hoping one day you'll make a dream last Am F G But dreams come slow and they go so fast Am F You see her when you close your eyes G Em Maybe one day you'll understand why Am F G Everything you touch surely dies [Chorus] F C But you only need the light when it's burning low G Am Only miss the sun when it starts to snow F C G Only know you love her when you let her go F C Only know you've been high when you're feeling low G Am Only hate the road when you're missin' home F C G Only know you love her when you let her go [Verse 2] Am F Staring at the ceiling in the dark G Em Same old empty feeling in your heart Am F G 'Cause love comes slow and it goes so fast Am F Well you see her when you fall asleep G Em But never to touch and never to keep Am 'Cause you loved her too much F G And you dived too deep [Chorus] F C Well, you only need the light when it's burning low G Am Only miss the sun when it starts to snow F C G Only know you love her when you let her go F C Only know you've been high when you're feeling low G Am Only hate the road when you're missin' home F C G Only know you love her when you let her go [Bridge] Am And you let her go F G Ooooo ooooo oooooo Am And you let her go F G Ooooooo ooooo ooooo Am F G Em And you let her go [Interlude] Am F G [Chorus] F C 'Cause you only need the light when it's burning low G Am Only miss the sun when it starts to snow F C G Only know you love her when you let her go F C Only know you've been high when you're feeling low G Am Only hate the road when you're missin' home F C G Only know you love her when you let her go [Chorus] (One Strum) F C 'Cause you only need the light when it's burning low G Am Only miss the sun when it starts to snow F C G Only know you love her when you let her go N.C. Only know you've been high when you're feeling low Only hate the road when you're missin' home Only know you love her when you let her go And you let her go Copy
item.dc:creator: Viktor Škorjanc

item.title: Reality
item.description: [Chorus] C Em Decisions as I go, to anywhere I flow. Am F Sometimes I believe, at times I'm rational. C Em I can fly high, i can go low Am F Today I got a million, tomorrow, I don't know. C Em Decisions as I go, to anywhere I flow. Am F Sometimes I believe, at times I'm rational. C Em I can fly high, i can go low Am F Today I got a million, tomorrow, I don't know. [Instrumental] C Em Am F (x2) [Verse 1] C Em Stop claiming what you own and think about the show. Am F We're all playing the same game, laying down alone. C Em We're unknown and known, special and a clone. Am F Hate will make you cautious, love will make you glow. C Em Make me feel the warm, make me feel the cold. Am F It's written in our story, it's written on the walls. C Em This is our call, we rise and we fall. Am F Dancin' in the moonlight, don't we have it all? [Instrumental] C Em Am F (x3) [Chorus] C Em Decisions as I go, to anywhere I flow. Am F Sometimes I believe, at times I'm rational. C Em I can fly high, i can go low Am F Today I got a million, tomorrow, I don't know. [Verse 2] C Em Make me feel the warm, make me feel the cold. Am F It's written in our story, it's written on the walls. C Em This is our call, we rise and we fall. Am F Dancin' in the moonlight, don't we have it all? [Outro] Copy
item.dc:creator: Viktor Škorjanc

item.title: Riptide
item.description: [Intro] Am G C Am G C [Verse 1] Am G C I was scared of dentists and the dark Am G C I was scared of pretty girls and starting conversations Am G C Oh, all my friends are turning green Am G C You're the magician's assistant in their dreams [Pre-chorus] Am G C Ooh, ooh, ooh Am G C Ooh, ooh, and they come unstuck [Chorus] Am G C Lady, running down to the riptide, taken away Am G C To the dark side, I wanna be your left hand man Am G C I love you when you're singing that song, and I got a lump Am G C In my throat, 'cause you're gonna sing the words wrong [Verse 2] Am G C There's this movie that I think you'll like Am G C This guy decides to quit his job and heads to New York City Am G C This cowboy's running from himself Am G C And she's been living on the highest shelf [Pre-chorus] Am G C Ooh, ooh, ooh Am G C Ooh, ooh, and they come unstuck [Chorus] Am G C Lady, running down to the riptide, taken away Am G C To the dark side, I wanna be your left hand man Am G C I love you when you're singing that song, and I got a lump Am G C In my throat, 'cause you're gonna sing the words wrong [Interlude] (C) e|-------3---------| B|-3h5-5-------5---| G|-----------5-----| D|-----------------| x4 A|-----------------| E|-----------------| [Bridge] Am G I just wanna, I just wanna know C Fmaj7 If you're gonna, if you're gonna stay Am G I just gotta, I just gotta know C Fmaj7 I can't have it, I can't have it any other way [Pre-chorus] (strum once and hold) Am G C I swear she's destined for the screen Am G C Closest thing to Michelle Pfeiffer that you've ever seen, oh [Chorus] Am G C Lady, running down to the riptide, taken away Am G C To the dark side, I wanna be your left hand man Am G C I love you when you're singing that song, and I got a lump Am G C In my throat, 'cause you're gonna sing the words wrong Am G C Lady, running down to the riptide, taken away Am G C To the dark side, I wanna be your left hand man Am G C I love you when you're singing that song, and I got a lump Am G C In my throat, 'cause you're gonna sing the words wrong Am G C Lady, running down to the riptide, taken away Am G C To the dark side, I wanna be your left hand man Am G C I love you when you're singing that song, and I got a lump Am G C In my throat, 'cause you're gonna sing the words wrong yeah, I got a lump Am G C In my throat, 'cause you're gonna sing the words wrong Copy
